verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tsaroanay tokoa izao
Sabata masinao
'Zay mahafaly, mahasoa,
Maneho ny hajanao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Ry Tompo, deraina Ianao
Fa Mpahary tokoa
Tahionao 'ty andro 'ty
'Zay lova hatrary.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He ! tazanay sahady re
Ny voninahitrao.
Fa andro soa sy lehiba
natokana ho Anao.
Ry Tompo, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tohano ny mpanomponao
Hatoky tsara izao.
Hanaja sy hitandrina
Ny andro masina.
Ry Tompo, sns.
